channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Russia launches deadly airstrikes on Kyiv as Trump pushes for Ukraine concessions
item.description: The Ukrainian military says Russia launched at least 215 drones and missiles at Ukraine, most aimed at the capital.

item.title: Trump changes tone over tariffs on China. And, new executive actions target education
item.description: Trump is changing his tone about tariffs on China, but it is unclear if he will change any policies. And, a sweeping list of executive actions targeti...

item.title: I quit Ozempic and embraced feeling healthy over striving for thinness
item.description: Taking the drug made one writer feel so sick she quit and focused on healthy habits instead of her body size. Turns out, 65% of people using GLP-1 dru...

item.title: Decades later, the Microsoft antitrust case casts a shadow over the Google trial
item.description: A nearly 30-year-old legal case looms large over the U.S. government's antitrust case against Google. A judge is hearing arguments to decide the penal...

item.title: Oil companies expected a big business boom under Trump. Now they're worried
item.description: Many oil company executives celebrated Donald Trump's return to the White House. But now expectations of higher profits are fading amid fears of a rec...

item.title: Benin admits that 54 soldiers killed in attack by al-Qaeda group
item.description: This is the deadliest known attack since insurgents began operating in Benin at the beginning of the decade.

item.title: Most Americans expect higher prices as a result of Trump’s tariffs, a new AP-NORC poll finds
item.description: A new AP-NORC poll suggests Americans’ trust in President Donald Trump to bolster the U.S. economy appears to be faltering.

item.title: Trump's meme coin surges after offer of dinner with the president
item.description: President Trump's meme coin had lost 88% of its value. But an offer of dinner with the president helped boost its price on Wednesday.

item.title: Tens of thousands queue to see Pope Francis's body
item.description: St Peter's Basilica had extended its opening hours to accommodate large crowds gathered outside.

item.title: K-pop singer Bain of Just B comes out during US concert
item.description: The star is among only a handful of K-pop artists who have come out publicly.

item.title: South Africa and Ukraine woo each other - as relationships with Trump turn sour
item.description: Volodymyr Zelensky is on a historic visit to South Africa to counter Russia's influence on the continent.

item.title: 3/20: CBS Morning News
item.description: President Trump to sign executive order to begin dismantling the Department of Education; Conservative environmental activist launches "Nature is Nonp...

item.title: From banning tech to ending sister-city ties, US states have at least 240 anti-China proposals
Tanzania bans South Africa and Malawi imports as trade row escalates
item.description: Tanzanian bananas are among the things hit in the dispute after Malawi stopped them from entering.

item.title: TikTok astrologer arrested for predicting big quake, spreading panic
item.description: John Moe The, who has a TikTok following of more than 300,000, forecast that a "very strong" quake would hit "every city in Myanmar."

item.title: Gunmen torch vehicles across Mexico as cartel turf war rages
item.description: The Jalisco New Generation cartel was designated a terrorist organization by U.S. President Donald Trump in February.

item.title: India retaliates against Pakistan after Kashmir attack kills 26
item.description: India's External Affairs Ministry said the Indus Water Treaty will be suspended after an attack in Kashmir left over two dozen dead.

item.title: Head of NAACP disinvited from speaking to Texas state bar over suit against Trump administration
